name: Book Library
backend_requirements: Book model: id, title (required), author (required), year (integer, optional), isbn (optional)
CRUD endpoints: GET /api/books, POST /api/books, PUT /api/books/:id, DELETE /api/books/:id
Search support: ?query=text searches title and author
Input validation: title and author required, year must be 4 digits
frontend_requirements: Book list table with columns: title, author, year
Add book form with title, author, year, isbn fields
Edit button opens form with pre-filled data
Simple search box to filter books
